entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:26 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:06 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 12:06 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
